#include<iostream>
#define MOD 1000000007
using namespace std;
 
 
unsigned long long int dp[10005];
 
void compute()
{
	dp[0]=0;
	dp[1]=9;
	dp[2]=90;
	dp[3]=900;
	for(int i=4;i<=10005;i++)
		dp[i] = (((dp[i-3]*9%MOD)+(dp[i-2]*9%MOD))%MOD+dp[i-1]*9%MOD)%MOD;
}
 
int main()
{
	compute();
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		int d;
		cin>>d;
		cout<<dp[d]<<"\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
